review: Dr Radhika was very reassuring to talk to about my problem and surgery. She was very patient and encouraging throughout the process, answered questions very clearly without jargon. She was amazing as my surgeon. A post op spike in pain I had was due to a nursing oversight but she was caring and still monitoring the situation alertly. Neat, clean surgery that I recovered with fully without any trouble or infection. She didn't palm me off to a side kick and was very easy to reach - you didn't need to wait for days for each appointment. She is a really excellent gynecologist, I've been recommending her to all the women I know after my experience. Oh and very transparent and honest also: you know that you're doing only the necessary tests, she also gives you full choice for where to do testing or surgery explaining pros and cons, without any pressure.

I consulted Dr.Radhika last year for my pregnancy. She is very friendly and professional. She explains properly regarding any doubts that you have. Since this was my first pregnancy I was very nervous about the whole journey, but she made me feel comfortable. I had a good normal delivery and also consulted her for post-delivery issues and she helped me through it.

I had been to hospital and consulted the doctor as had gynae issue. ********* *** *** **** ** ****** ** * **** ****** *** *** **** ** ****** *** *** ***** *** **** *** ****** *** ********* **** She was not interested to know what was issue. ******* ***** ********** First time I met this doctor. Medicine was prescribed by doctor. Blood test was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Scanning was also done.

I met Dr. Radhika during my annual health checkup. My gynaec issue was more of a discomfort then, hence never sought a permanent solution. She clarified the pros and cons of  possible solutions in a scientific yet practical manner. She gave me the confidence to undergo a laproscopic surgery with multiple benefits that it seemed the right thing to do. She was always reachable by whatsapp and cleared all our doubts. Surgery dates were conveniently booked, well planned and executed flawlessly. Post op recovery was excellent with no issues, walking in 2 days as promised by her.  Never took any referral or second opinion. Decision was easy, as all it needed was faith and she gave that in plenty. Thank you Dr. Radhika.

I had a gynae issue so went to hospital and consulted the doctor. Treatment was ok by doctor. Solution given by doctor was not satisfied. For me, solution is important not money. **** ****** *** *** ****** Later I went to different doctor *** ** ***** *** ********* Surgery was suggested by Dr. G.Radhika. Medical tests were suggested but it was not done. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Doctor was friendly with me.

We met Dr. G. Radhika actually for the second opinion. She went through our medical records and advised us in a short and sweet way without panicking us about my health hazard - multiple fibroids requiring immediate hysterectomy surgery. She gave us balanced advice before, during and after the surgery to me and my family. The teething troubles we encountered were well handled by doctor mam with immediate response through WhatsApp and phone calls with down-to-earth positive attitude with actual facts. We forget our worries of illness with her kindness and smiling face. The most dependable doctor we have ever seen.

My First Pregnancy.. I came to know about 
Dr. Radhika from my Sister's friend. Doctor is extremely friendly and Kind in nature. She listened to my health issues and explained the root cause of the problem and motivated me through her positive words . She gave me her utmost care at the time of delivery. It is rare to see such a friendly Doctor .  I thank God for showing me the best gynocologist.  Thank you So much Doctor for the care and support you gave ..I Wish Doctor to continue this service for many years..
I consulted Dr.Radhika at Apollo Spectra Alwarpet. I found her a very friendly and knowledgeable doctor. She listened to my complaints with patience,examined throughly and prescribed what was needed.
We had a very smooth & amazing pregnancy journey with Dr. G.Radhika. She is truly a remarkable doctor and professional whom we respect and trust.
Happy with the way my daughter was treated .She took pains to explain the course of treatment and was available telephonically for follow through queries.
